item.title: Leadership is Language
item.description: I’m currently reading Leadership is language by L. David Marquet, the same author of Turn the Ship Around . In this book, Marquet describes the different ways people communicate and how it influences the outcomes we get. This should not be any news really, but the book explains in much more detail how this happens. Especially when there is a power dynamic between the participants of a conversation or meeting.
